Spiking-recovery experiment The investigator propose spiking-recovery experiment 30 serum sample different woman basal FSH concentration vary 0-14 IU/L divide two equal volume part spike specific concentration rFSH ( Gonal-F , follitropin alpha ; Merck Serono ) provide calculate rise FSH concentration similar vivo serum level .
